item.title: Dozens missing after boat carrying 200 migrants sinks off Gambia
item.description: It is the latest accident on one of the worldâ€™s most dangerous routes used by West Africans trying to reach Spain.

item.title: Trump says he takes higher daily dose of aspirin than doctors recommend
item.description: In an interview about his health, the US president says: "I don't want thick blood pouring through my heart".

item.title: Indian families grieve deaths caused by contaminated tap water
item.description: Officials in Indore say four people have died after drinking contaminated water but families allege the toll is higher.

item.title: Watch: Four men rescued from boat teetering on dam edge
item.description: According to reports, the boat had suffered motor failure before drifting to the edge of the dam

item.title: Maduro says Venezuela open to US talks on drug trafficking
item.description: In an interview with state TV, the Venezuelan president also evaded a question about an attack in his country claimed by the US.
